mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(e.emp_name , CONCAT(' ', l.lev_type)) AS emp_name , l.start_date , l.end_date FROM lev_table AS l INNER JOIN emp_table AS e ON l.emp_id = e.emp_id

SELECT dep_code.dep_name, emp_name, pstn_code.job_name, lev_type FROM lev_table INNER JOIN emp_table ON lev_table.emp_id = emp_table.emp_id INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = emp_table.dep_no INNER JOIN pstn_code ON pstn_code.job_code = emp_table.job_code WHERE start_date = #{startDate};
SELECT count(*) FROM expreport WHERE appr_id = #{empId} AND appr_state = 'N'
